# gitea_team_membership (Data Source)

Get information about a team membership (checks if a user is a member of a team)

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "gitea_team_membership" "example" {
  team_id  = 123
  username = "johndoe"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `org` (String) The name of the organization
- `team_name` (String) The name of the team
- `username` (String) The username of the team member
